mapper.select: SELECT '202310' AS month, ROAD_NAME, DIR_NAME, ST_NAME, ED_NAME, DISTANCE, AVG(CASE WHEN 요일 = '평일' THEN SPEED END) AS 평일평균, AVG(CASE WHEN 요일 = '주말' THEN SPEED END) AS 주말평균, AVG(SPEED) AS 전체평균 FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN I_D = '월' THEN '평일' WHEN I_D = '화' THEN '평일' WHEN I_D = '수' THEN '평일' WHEN I_D = '목' THEN '평일' WHEN I_D = '금' THEN '평일' WHEN I_D = '토' THEN '주말' WHEN I_D = '일' THEN '주말' ELSE NULL END AS 요일, AXIS_IDX, ROAD_NAME, DIR_NAME, ST_NAME, ED_NAME, DISTANCE, SPEED, ROAD_IDX, LINK_IDX FROM TB_SEOCHO_RESULT WHERE ROAD_NAME <> '<평균>' AND ST_NAME <> '*' AND I_DAY BETWEEN '20240901' AND '20240931' ) AS subquery GROUP BY ROAD_NAME, DIR_NAME, ST_NAME, ED_NAME, DISTANCE, ROAD_IDX, LINK_IDX, AXIS_IDX ORDER BY AXIS_IDX, ROAD_NAME, DIR_NAME DESC, LINK_IDX;
